Key Match Events: The U.S. fell short by 18 runs against South Africa
Andries Gous and Harmeet Singh had a 91-run partnership
Post-Match Reflections: Aaron Jones expressed disappointment about the defeat
Jones mentioned the team's potential to beat any team in the world
Miscellaneous Highlights: The U.S. qualified for the Super Eight phase of the T20 World Cup
The next match for the U.S. is against West Indies in Bridgetown
Others: Quinton De Kock top scored for South Africa with 74 runs from 40 balls
Aiden Markram supported De Kock with 46 runs
Kagiso Rabada took the wicket of Harmeet in the 19th over to effectively end the U.S.'s chances
